about.bio: Experienced Analytics Engineer specializing in data warehousing, business intelligence, and data visualization. Passionate about transforming raw data into actionable insights with expertise in cloud platforms and modern data stack technologies.
focus: Building scalable data pipelines and ETL processes
Creating interactive dashboards and data visualizations
Implementing data governance and quality frameworks
Leading data teams and managing analytics projects

experience.title: Data Analytics Engineer & Project Management
experience.description: Leading data team and implementing comprehensive data governance solutions for medical data processing while ensuring RGPD compliance and HL7 health standards.
achievements: Implemented data governance framework using Azure Purview for data quality management
Designed and deployed inter-application data flow architectures
Automated reporting processes using Power Automate and Logic Apps orchestration
Built comprehensive Power BI solutions for medical data visualization

experience.title: Data Analyst & Project Management

achievements: Developed Python and SQL scripts to unify data from internal and external sources
Created interactive visualizations to identify target demographics and optimize actions
Implemented automated monthly reporting and regular report distribution
Analyzed customer and beneficiary feedback for effective activity management

experience.title: Data Analyst
